articles.title: AirAsia narrow losses in Q2, sees V-shaped resumption in air travel demand - The Star Online
articles.description: KUALA LUMPUR: AirAsia Group Bhd said revenue climbed on the second quarter ended June 30, coming from a low base last year and boosted by the jump in contribution from its expanding digital and lifestyle businesses.
